triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: Streaming data clustering is the main task the paper addresses, building on cluster analysis techniques.

triples.name: Data stream mining
triples.relevance: Streaming data clustering is a subfield of data stream mining which processes continuous data records.

triples.name: Hierarchical clustering
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a hierarchical merging strategy that builds on hierarchical clustering concepts.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Streaming data clustering is identified as a popular research topic in data mining.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Streaming data clustering is a key research topic in machine learning for handling dynamic data.

triples.name: Self-organizing map
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel self-growth map that extends self-organizing map concepts for streaming clustering.
